lines: Finally free !
I was waiting so long for a body to come in this place...
Thanks for saving me young ma...
Oh no ! I did not pay attention ! You are not a mage, neither a human...
You are a... dice ? What a dice is doing here ?
Oh I did not present myself, I'm a crystal spirit.
I do not have any memories, the only thing I know is...
...my role is to assist young mage in their process of learning magic.
It's been a long time I did not see any forms of life.
But you are here... If I succeeded to attach myself to you, it means you have soul.
How is it possible ? What happened to you ?
Well... I don't known myself what happened to me.
For now, we need to leave this place to gather some informations.
It seems you can't do anything without me.
I can make you move but be careful, my energy is limited.
If I run out of energy, we go bust.
Let's do it !
Now you can move ! I hope you know how to roll because I don't.
Oh ! Watch ! An active blue crystal !
I can absorb some energy with that !
We may need it later.
I'm too weak to fully absorb it but it's a start.
Come closer and touch it. I will do the rest.
I haven't felt this for a long time !
it looks like our path is going to be harder and harder.
With that energy, I can make you fly for a limited time.
Be careful, It will consume my energy, so you need to charge it up again.
And... I don't know how your body works since you are dice.
I would say... Just try !
